Note.Content: RSV NRSV ESV "talk against me" NIV "ridicule me" NJPS "speak against me" NJB " start jeering at me" GNT "laugh" CEV "make fun" Craigie "jeer at" Pope "revile" | REB "turn their backs on me" DCH Clines "turn the back"
RSV NRSV ESV "speaks with" NIV NJPS "contend with" NJB "in dispute with" REB "confronted by" GNT "meets with" CEV "attack with arguments" Allen "argue" | DCH Dahood "to drive out"
RSV ESV "word will endure" NJPS NRSV "testify" NJB "not be silenced" REB "speak on" | GNT "word is accepted" Allen "speaks" Bruce "testify" Fox "speak" | DCH "destroy" NIV "be destroyed"
RSV NRSV CEV ESV "spoke" NJPS "said" | DCH "turn the back" NIV "departure" NJB "flight" REB "turned his back"
RSV "talking idly" NIV "speaking idle words" | DCH "manage" NRSV "pursuing your own affairs" REB "attending to your own affairs" | NJPS "strike bargains"
MT HOTTP-C NIV NJPS NJB | RSV NRSV REB GNT ESV "the word" = {L:דָּבָר<SDBH:דָּבָר>}

LEXSense.DefinitionShort: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else
= action or process by which a nation gains control over someone else, usually involving violence

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which groups of humans utter words in order to communicate something among themselves
